content: Se la firma è caricata da remoto (anzichè inclusa nella mail) Thunderbird la blocca per ragioni di sicurezza. Puoi disattivare -a tuo rischio- questa funzione sia per la singola mail che per uno specifico mittente. E puoi anche disabilitarla del tutto (sconsigliato). Qui trovi come procedere -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/contenuti-remoti-nei-messaggi
creator: @next

content: I have filed a suggestion that the menu bar be set as default, and it has received many likes, but I doubt it will happen. The menu bar was removed from default setup with version 78. Yes, the menu bar is much more powerful and I regularly find that users are not aware of it. Thanks for the feedback.

content: Mail.com requires a premium account to use an email client such as thunderbird. If you prefer to use an email client, such as Thunderbird (which is obviously our preference), you need a premium account. If you want a free account, you might consider, gmail, outlook, or gmx.

content:
Hello there We have read question We try to help

The meaning of being in the STAT at this moment is that moment of delivery and service the connection is gone after that.

The message of this drop down box is good for the account that you are using with Thunderbird.The problem itself seems to came from Thunderbird itself wit use of a another email software .you could change the delivering time for e-mail in the server settings if that is a possible option it depends of what you are using on that pc. This temporary situation or issue could be gone in days just like how it came there on that pc without doing nothing to it.looking Inside that program where the stat message pop up came for on the desktop screen if it s needed to change something to solve this ,try find the option of using pop settings for this account try to disable that function then go out of the program and try to go back in there to see if something is solved there.If that not seems to work direct try to change the account to a IMAP setting , this option of having that configuration of of that sort of account gives that subject the moment of using that function of that Stat process a little bit more time to deliver that mail to the program then that pop configuration, normally it seems to have 10 min before checking that mail again for the inbox delivery. ,it should solve that issue .Some people do like a pop configuration above the IMAP configuration .to use that change from pop to IMAP do solve that subject more quicker than waiting for the moment to solve it itsel. Greetings Firefox volunteer.
creator: Googlethunderbird

content: Ciao Next, grazie per il tuo messaggio: purtroppo Menu strumenti>Importa non risolve la questione (ho allegato le immagini). In quella sezione non è presente la possibilità di "ri-collegare" la rubrica del MacOs a Thunderbird.
creator: edoardolimone

content:
Se la rubrica del MAC ti permette di esportare i contatti in uno dei formati CSV, VCARD, LDIF, SQLITE o MAB allora: - Esporta i contatti (preferibilmente in CSV o VCARD) - Apri Thunderbird ed apri la Rubrica - A sinistra in basso c'è il tasto Importa

Per una sincronizzazione invece non saprei che dirti, non so neppure se esiste questa funzione o Thunderbird si limita ad importare la rubrica che trova al momento dell'installazione. È qualcosa che andrebbe trattata da qualcuno che usi ila Mac.
creator: @next

content: Grazie Next. Proverò questa soluzione o ripiegherò su un’estensione specifica per la gestione contatti.
creator: edoardolimone
